short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All data is safely stored in a password vault and can be accessed through the Secure Vault.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A password manager is a technology tool that helps internet users create, save, manage and use passwords across different online services and applications. A password manager seeks to enhance both the usability and security of passwords. It empowers users to store distinctive, intricate passwords for each online account and application profile, eliminating the need to memorize them. All data is safely stored in a password vault and can be accessed through the password manager.
